name: Railing Chaos
description:
Hello everyone, this is my take on the Jams Every Now and Then, a minijam series that I did with a group of friends to expand our Portfolio.

This one is a little unfinished because I was working in a full-time job and then my family decided to go on vacation.

Even though I wish that you like the game and give it a try.

Objective:

You have to create the rails so that the packages can arrive to the X exit, don't let them fell or collide with each other!

To create rails left mouse on an empty tile and to erase them left mouse on a rail tile.
